channel.title: Rename a item?
channel.description: How can i rename a item so its not have the name like: Partyhat[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 08:47:12 AM[/size][hr]help O_O?

well ive never tried the rs2 caches on it, but it might work with normal caches, but otherwords yes you have to convert them into halo. map files

@System79 wrote:

Mm, but you have to convert to halo maps as you said .map files? If its a halo modding program like DotHalo you need specific syntaxes in your .map file, and theres a validationhash on it.

item.title: Rename a item?
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

HEX Workshop 5.2 would be a good start, also, it might be hard to use HEX Editor’s, cause the view is WAY diffrent.
I think you should try the tutorials coming with HEX Workshop 5.2,
Have fun

Read full topic

item.title: Rename a item?
item.dc:creator: @haruki haruki
item.description:
@haruki wrote:

only way you would be able to do that would be to hex edit, i dont know toomuch about hexediting runescape, but i used to hex edit halo 2 to rename guns and cars and wutnot, anyways the only way your going to be able to change it INGAME would be to hex edit, you could use a program called allus bos v2 but you would have to convert all the cache’s into a.map file and for that you would need amillion other programs, so i would ask somone where to get a hex editer for the rs cache’s

Read full topic
